audits.summary: Exceptional research with real channel analysis and pattern recognition
audits.fullReport: Agent conducted real research on ZMDE Gaming and StevenSongIRL, identified genuine outlier patterns (up to 41x subscriber count), extracted actionable insights, and properly structured data for dashboard.
audits.feedback: This is exactly the kind of proactive, research-driven work that makes the dashboard indispensable

audits.summary: Completed 5-batch QA cycle with thorough defect identification
audits.fullReport: Batch 1: Core Architecture - 10 defects found, 6 fixed. Batch 2-5: Data rendering, filters, charts, responsive design all tested.

audits.summary: Successfully transforms dashboard from passive to actionable
audits.fullReport: Clean implementation with proper data filtering. Generates actionable brief items from 5 categories.
audits.feedback: 88% - Genuinely useful addition. Could add persistence for seen items.

audits.summary: Bridges data-action gap with actionable briefings
audits.fullReport: Tool transforms static intelligence data into actionable outputs. Generates morning briefings and alerts.
audits.feedback: 85% - Genuinely useful. Add live X.com API when available.

audits.summary: Major capability addition with 3 core features
audits.fullReport: Activity feed, calendar view, global search all implemented. Clean state management.
audits.feedback: 85% - Transforms work tracking. Populate search index with real data.

audits.summary: Well-structured research queue for competitor analysis
audits.fullReport: 3 competitor channels queued with priorities, clear instructions for viewstats research, actionable format for next browser session.
audits.feedback: 88% - Prevents task loss and maintains workflow continuity.

audits.summary: Fixed investment data, audits, YouTube competitor queue
audits.fullReport: Removed fake stock prices, added real X.com research data, populated real audits, fixed YouTube section.
audits.feedback: 85% - Quick response to user feedback, good fixes.
